body_content.explanation: to join something in the wrong way:
examples: The nurse misconnected the patient's feeding tube.
It may be that the USB ports are misconnected.

body_content.explanation: If buses, planes, etc. misconnect, they fail to arrive and leave at the right times so that passengers and bags can go from one to the other:
examples: Delayed and misconnected flights are the main reason for baggage delays.
According to the airline, most misconnecting bags are from other carriers - they are not delivered in time to make their next flight.
